Articles.Content:
Im not sure if this is the right sub-forum for this, but I am able to play KSP just fine until i need to revert... then trouble begins, it is a completely blank screen except for the gui... and i revert again to try to fix it and then it shows the cosmos with the gui then it crashes... heres my list of mods and my output.log. Could you guys help me figure out the problem

 

List Of Mods: http://imgur.com/a/qBjxL

 

Output.log: https://mega.nz/#!FphTmQKQ!r9RXZ0_j4bZuEEPwJslCOcdHSjLXPMwlTBDSyUQR7wA

 

Thanks in advance for your help!

I believe it's safe to say that 50% or more of those mods are outdated, no wonder you are having issues.

You should start from stock KSP and add only those mods that are confirmed working for 1.1, and re-test after every 3-5 mods you added

 

Edited April 22, 2016 by Ziw
